casebody.data:
Supreme Court, Appellate Term, December, 1896.

Before Daly, P. J., McAdam and Bischoff, JJ.

Bernard Mackell, Respondent, v. Henry G. Hilton, Appellant. Appeal from a judgment and order of the General Term of the City Court affirming a judgment of said Court and denying a motion for a new trial. Rollin Tracy, for Appellant; Coffin & Smith, for Respondent.

Affirmed, with costs, upon, argument.
